channel.title: How do i put pictures in with my posts?
channel.description: Hey guys how do i put pictures with my post? i wanna advertise, but want to let ppl see my pics. How do i do that?? lol

item.title: How do i put pictures in with my posts?
item.dc:creator: @Imlostru Imlostru
item.description:
@Imlostru wrote:

mjordan. Get the rep out of your signature. It is againest the rules…

“We do not talk about rep period. if your asking for it, or just saying you’ve given it.”

So yea don’t risk being banned from something stupid like that.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i put pictures in with my posts?

item.title: How do i put pictures in with my posts?
item.dc:creator: @mjordan mjordan
item.description:
@mjordan wrote:

ok well do you know how to take and edit screen shots? if so then take a screen shot and edit it or do whatever you want to it. then go to www.allyoucanupload.com and then just do what it tells you to, and it will give you a URL and you just put it in a post here or anywhere. if you dont know how to take screen shots or need more help just say so here. you can also put the URL that it gives you in between and it will show the image right in the post, or if you just post the url then of course they will have to click on it to see your pic.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i put pictures in with my posts?

item.title: How do i put pictures in with my posts?
item.dc:creator: @Imlostru Imlostru
item.description:
@Imlostru wrote:

paste your picture in paint. save it. go to www.imageshack.us and upload it (or press the host button) then use the 'Hotlink for forums 1"

Read full topic
